topDeals.name: A pre-fabricated home in a shipping container
topDeals.description: Who says you have to pay exorbitant broker fees to find the home of your dreams? You can make your dreams of homeownership come true as easily as you’d buy a bottle of dish soap, thanks to this storage-container-turned-house, available for a cool $36K. topDeals.name: 1,500 live ladybugs
topDeals.description: Who says you can’t buy anything for under $10 anymore? In fact, Amazon shoppers can buy 1,500 crawling, flying somethings for the bargain price of a latte.

topDeals.name: Uranium ore
topDeals.description: While this small amount of uranium ore is pretty low on the radioactivity meter, it’s pretty weird that you can buy it from the same site where you get your gym socks. And for more possessions to ditch, discover these
